entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 17 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 10 except temperature steady near minus 2 over southern sections.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10 except temperature steady near minus 2 over southern sections. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 20 January 2023
